title: "Get Metadata"
author: "C. Savonen, CCDL for ALSF"
date: "12/13/2018"
output: html_document
---

```{r GEO}
library(GEOquery)
```

```{r Put GSE's here}
gse <- c("GSE84465", "GSE57872")
```

```{r Download each and write to a tsv}
metadata <- lapply(gse, function(x) {
                   meta <- getGEO(x)
                   readr::write_tsv(meta[[1]]@phenoData@data, 
                                    file.path("results", paste0(x, "_meta.tsv")))
            })
```
